---
description: Common development tasks for Bridgeserver
---

# Development Workflows

## Start Development Server
Start the Next.js development server with Pglite.
```bash
bun dev
```

## Run Tests
Run the test suite.
```bash
bun test
```

## Seed Database
Populate the database with test data.
```bash
bun run seed
```

## Lint Code
Check for code quality issues.
```bash
bun run lint
```

## Database Studio
Open Drizzle Studio to view and edit data.
```bash
bun drizzle-kit studio
```
